name: beyondcorp_organizations_locations_subscriptions_create
description: Creates a new BeyondCorp Enterprise Subscription in a given organization. Location will always be global as BeyondCorp subscriptions are per organization.

parent.description: Required. The resource name of the subscription location using the form: `organizations/{organization_id}/locations/{location}`

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

GoogleCloudBeyondcorpSaasplatformSubscri.description: A BeyondCorp Subscription resource represents BeyondCorp Enterprise Subscription. BeyondCorp Enterprise Subscription enables BeyondCorp Enterprise permium features for an organization.

autoRenewEnabled.description: Output only. Represents that, if subscription will renew or end when the term ends.

createTime.description: Output only. Create time of the subscription.

endTime.description: Output only. End time of the subscription.

name.description: Required. Unique resource name of the Subscription. The name is ignored when creating a subscription.

seatCount.description: Optional. Number of seats in the subscription.

startTime.description: Output only. Start time of the subscription.

state.description: Output only. The current state of the subscription.
